member.name: M:Unchase.Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.Extensions.Extensions.SwaggerGenOptionsExtensions.IncludeXmlCommentsWithRemarks(Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.SwaggerGen.SwaggerGenOptions,System.Func{System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument},System.Boolean,System.Type[])
member.summary: Inject human-friendly descriptions for Operations, Parameters and Schemas based on XML Comment files (from summary and remarks).
member.param: A factory method that returns XML Comments as an XPathDocument.
Flag to indicate if controller XML comments (i.e. summary) should be used to assign Tag descriptions. Don't set this flag if you're customizing the default tag for operations via TagActionsBy.
Types for which remarks will be excluded.

member.name: M:Unchase.Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.Extensions.Extensions.SwaggerGenOptionsExtensions.IncludeXmlCommentsWithRemarks(Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.SwaggerGen.SwaggerGenOptions,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Type[])
member.summary: Inject human-friendly descriptions for Operations, Parameters and Schemas based on XML Comment files (from summary and remarks).
member.param: An absolute path to the file that contains XML Comments.
Flag to indicate if controller XML comments (i.e. summary) should be used to assign Tag descriptions. Don't set this flag if you're customizing the default tag for operations via TagActionsBy.
Types for which remarks will be excluded.

member.name: T:Unchase.Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.Extensions.Options.FixEnumsOptions
member.summary: Various configuration properties for fixing enums.

member.name: P:Unchase.Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.Extensions.Options.FixEnumsOptions.IncludedXmlCommentsPaths
member.summary: Included file paths with XML comments.

member.name: P:Unchase.Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.Extensions.Options.FixEnumsOptions.IncludeDescriptions
member.summary: Include descriptions from or xml comments. Default value is false.

member.name: P:Unchase.Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.Extensions.Options.FixEnumsOptions.IncludeXEnumRemarks
member.summary: Include remarks for descriptions from xml comments. Default value is false.

member.name: P:Unchase.Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.Extensions.Options.FixEnumsOptions.DescriptionSource
member.summary: Source to get descriptions. Default value is .

member.name: P:Unchase.Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.Extensions.Options.FixEnumsOptions.ApplySchemaFilter
member.summary:
Apply fix enum filter to OpenApi schema. Default value is true.
Equivalent to "options.SchemaFilter<XEnumNamesSchemaFilter>();"

member.name: P:Unchase.Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.Extensions.Options.FixEnumsOptions.ApplyParameterFilter
member.summary:
Apply fix enum filter to OpenApi parameters. Default value is true.
Equivalent to "options.ParameterFilter<XEnumNamesParameterFilter>();"

member.name: P:Unchase.Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.Extensions.Options.FixEnumsOptions.ApplyDocumentFilter
member.summary:
Apply fix enum filter to OpenApi document. Default value is true.
Equivalent to "options.DocumentFilter<DisplayEnumsWithValuesDocumentFilter>();"

member.name: P:Unchase.Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.Extensions.Options.FixEnumsOptions.XEnumNamesAlias
member.summary: Alias for replacing "x-enumNames" in swagger documentation.

member.name: P:Unchase.Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.Extensions.Options.FixEnumsOptions.XEnumDescriptionsAlias
member.summary: Alias for replacing "x-enumDescriptions" in swagger documentation.

member.summary: New line for enum values descriptions.
